channel.title: Stats on Get Amongst It!
channel.description: Recent content in Stats on Get Amongst It!

item.title: Introducing the Docker Image for fitzRoy
item.description: Over the past couple of months I have observed James of plusSixOne fame, create and extend the great R package for AFL stats called fitzRoy. It has been some time since I have used R and it took me a while to get up and going. Along my journey, I have tinkered with a Docker image for fitzRoy. This was primarily due to my use containers in my day to day work and wanting to isolate any of the dependencies.
